About

Hello, my name is Samreen Mahak Hassan. I come from Patna, India and living in Tartu, Estonia. At present I'm working on my master's thesis which is to design and develop a client-server architecture for privacy preserving secure collaborative data analytics in an insecure third-party infrastructure environment. You could contact me through email or/and see my resume here Roshan Mehta.
